reviews.text: A favourite place for busy bees to get their official work done. Be it court work, or visiting Dooars Kanya, getting driving licence, settling dispute, spending days at correction house, or students spending time at the University.
It's such a nice experience.. Although all the pics are not from there... But it's in my heart.. So i find every place as like it was

places_with_reviews.name: ALIPURDUAR DURGABARI
places_with_reviews.address: FGH9+HCF, near Durgabari temple, Hatkhola, Alipurduar, Sobhaganj, West Bengal 736121, India

reviews.text: "The Durga Puja ceremony at the temple is excellently conducted, showcasing dedication and tradition. However, other pujas may not receive the same level of attention to detail and reverence."

The place to be during the durga puja..the most happening place during the festival time..you can find people from all walks of life and from every generation you can think of..bhog or prasad served during durga puja is just awesome and extremely satisfying..if you are in alipurduar then a must visit..
This is one of the most famous temples in Alipurduar where Durgapuja is observed with the utmost sincerity every year.
This temple is near to my Home. I grew up by seeing this temple. You will find peace at this place.

Spiritually Peaceful . Located near kaljani river on the western fringe of the town. For many decades it has served as the prime location for Durga Puja in the town. Fairs are regular here during festive seasons. Surely you will feel nostalgic if you ever visit this place. Ashtami and Dashami is very colourful here and popular among the youths.

reviews.text: Visited to perform evening prayer, the place needs attention of responsible men taking care of administration of the mosque...
This is only one masjid near alipurduar cowpatti, between  alipurduar jn. To alipurduar cowpatti you could not find any other masjid..
Small but unique for Muslims  community for prayer in alipurduar .2 minutes from alipurduar chupathy
